title: Giro d’Italia Stage 17: Isaac del Toro Withstands Attacks over Mortirolo to Defend Pink, Win Stage
content:
Isaac del Toro bounces back to win stage and tighten grip on pink jersey in daring solo attack after surviving the Mortirolo.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Stage 17: Isaac del Toro Withstands Attacks over Mortirolo to Defend Pink, Win Stage on Velo.
author: ahood
